Package org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal

package org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.forgerock.openidm.servlet
    OpenIDM servlet registration handling implementation.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ErrorServletComponent
    A component to create and register a Jetty error-handler servlet.
    IDMSecurityContextFactory
    An HttpServletContextFactory responsible for creating a SecurityContext for OpenIDM requests.
    ServletComponent
    A component to create and register the "API" Servlet; that is, the CHF Servlet that 1) listens on /openidm, 2) dispatches to the HttpApplication, that is composed of a) the auth filter b) the JSON resource HTTP Handler, that i) converts CHF Requests to CREST requests, and ii) routes them on the CREST router using the external ConnectionFactory.
    ServletConnectionFactory
    The ServletConnectionFactory responsible for providing Connections to routing requests initiated from an external request on the api servlet.
